channel.title: Core Values on chrislindsay.org

item.title: Valuing Challenge
item.description: Hello. Thanks for watching. My name is Chris Lindsay Thanks for taking the time to watch this live video. I want to talk to you this week about what I believe is my most important core value. This value is something that you might not even consider to be one that you’d want to hold. In fact, it might be one that you might want to consider avoiding.
